description: In the first scene, Vista and Matthews wake up in the bed they share. Matthews wants some action but Vista disses him and leaves for work. Matthews decides to call up a guy (Dean Edwards) he met a week earlier. Edwards comes over, and Matthews fucks him silly. When Vista calls in from work, Matthews is relaxing with his dick in Edwardss mouth, but he tells Vista that he is home alone.
title: Dean Edwards and Scott Matthews
